message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product and I believe it would be valuable to you. I'm initially offering it at $18,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it.
Bob, thanks for your interest. I understand your perspective on the price. While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $15,000. I believe this offer reflects a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product.
